title: Investigate and propse the new experimental telemetry usage via VS experiments
body:
### Context
We might need to keep the curently onboarded telemetry usage as opt-in only (due to ongoing hardening of the libs/platform). So in order to get some feedback and data prior to a major VS release our option is to enable this for subpopulation via VS controlled experiments

### Steps
- investigate https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_wiki/wikis/DevDiv.wiki/11966/Controlled-Experiments-(Controlled-Rollouts-AB-Tests)
- propose the concrete steps for running the A/B with our new telemetry
